dailyChallenge.name: Stay Hydrated
dailyChallenge.description: Drink 2 liters of water throughout the day

dailyChallenge.name: No Sugar
dailyChallenge.description: Avoid consuming sugar for the entire day

dailyChallenge.name: Plank Challenge
dailyChallenge.description: Hold a plank position for 3 minutes

monthlyChallenge.name: Swimming
monthlyChallenge.description: Swim for a total of 15 hours during the month

monthlyChallenge.name: No Processed Foods
monthlyChallenge.description: Avoid consuming processed foods for 30 days

monthlyChallenge.name: Sleep Quality
monthlyChallenge.description: Focus on improving sleep quality throughout the month
